sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: In an equilateral triangle, each side has a length of 7 cm. What is the perimeter of the triangle?
message_2:
In an equilateral triangle, all sides are equal in length. Since each side has a length of 7 cm, the perimeter of the triangle is:

Perimeter = Side 1 + Side 2 + Side 3
Perimeter = 7 cm + 7 cm + 7 cm
Perimeter = 21 cm
